snippet: Utterances of exile, or not, from the famous and infamous.
abstract: Loose Ends column by editor Thomas Vinciguerra rounds up promises made by public figures to leave the country or a state should someone they dislike win elected office, on the occasion of the health care reform law being upheld by the Supreme Court, which radio talk show host Rush Limbaugh said would compel him to move to Costa Rica.
lead_paragraph: Utterances of exile, or not, from the famous and infamous.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
